get_UCR_data[source]

get_UCR_data(dsid, path='.', parent_dir='data/UCR', on_disk=True, return_split=True, split_data=True, force_download=False, verbose=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dsid = 'NATOPS' 
X_train, y_train, X_valid, y_valid = get_UCR_data(dsid, verbose=True)
X, y, splits = get_UCR_data(dsid, split_data=False)
test_eq(X[splits[0]], X_train)
test_eq(y[splits[1]], y_valid)
test_eq(X[splits[0]], X_train)
test_eq(y[splits[1]], y_valid)
test_type(X, X_train)
test_type(y, y_train)

Dataset: NATOPS

y_train: (180,)
X_valid: (180, 24, 51)
y_valid: (180,)
